capabilities.description: Initiate a performance test. Meshery will execute the load generation, collect metrics, and present the results.
Configure the workload specific setting of a component
Configure Labels And Annotations for  the component
Configure the visual styles for the component
Change the shape of the component
Drag and Drop a component into a parent component in graph view
